author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HURRICANE WARNING ISSUED FOR THE CAYMAN ISLANDS...
summary:
...HURRICANE WARNING ISSUED FOR THE CAYMAN ISLANDS...
 As of 7:05 AM EST Mon Nov 4
 the center of Eighteen was located near 14.8, -76.8
 with movement N at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Potential Tropical Cyclone Eighteen (AT3/AL182024)
